# Combat Fluidness, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 4]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mageâ€™s Tower website

As *[[Combat Fluidness (Spell)|combat fluidness]]*, except the arcane bonus to initiative is +3 and this more powerful variant also conveys a +3 arcane bonus to armor class instead of allowing the caster to be considered on guard.
